content: chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet in each single_crochet around to row 20 of left front slip_stitch turn row 2 slip_stitch in next 3 st single_crochet around slip_stitch in fourth single_crochet from end of row 1 miss last 3 st of row 1 turn row 3-7 slip_stitch in first 3 st single_crochet around miss last 3 st turn row 8 slip_stitch in first 2 st single_crochet to shoulder seam double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet around to opposite shoulder seam single_crochet around miss last 2 slip_stitch row 9 single_crochet in next 5 st half_double_crochet in single_crochet to shoulder seam double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet to opposite shoulder seam half_double_crochet in single_crochet single_crochet in last 5 st turn row 10 single_crochet 5 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next 8 st 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet to last 6 st 5 half_double_crochet single_crochet turn row 11 single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet double_crochet in next 12 st 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet to last 4 st 3 half_double_crochet single_crochet turn fasten_off and weave in ends collar finishing join yarn to row 20 of right front single_crochet in same st as joining single_crochet around to row 20 of left front slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends peplum hem row 1 with middle sized hook join yarn to the left front hem chain 1 single_crochet in same st as joining single_crochet in each single_crochet across 1 single_crochet in each chain-2 space turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next 20 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet across turn row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each increase of row 2 across turn row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn row 5 switch larger hook chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn row 6-10 chain 2 double_crochet in each st across turn finishing chain 1 single_crochet along raw edge of right front peplum slip_stitch to body of jacket
